healing_cure_loops.description: Disease-to-Cure Transformation Pathways with Global Yields for MEGAZION INHERITANCE LEDGER

loops.cure_pathway: Cancer → Regenerative Biotech → Cellular Reprogramming → Economy Multipliers
loops.cure_description: Transform cancer treatment through regenerative biotechnology and cellular reprogramming, creating new medical industries and economic prosperity
loops.yield_per_iteration: Exponential growth based on economy multiplier and iteration count

loops.cure_pathway: Cardiovascular Disease → Bioengineered Heart Tissue → Regenerative Cardiology → Economic Infrastructure
loops.cure_description: Revolutionize heart disease treatment through bioengineered tissues and regenerative cardiology, spawning new medical and engineering industries
loops.yield_per_iteration: Exponential growth based on economy multiplier and iteration count

loops.cure_pathway: Neurological Disorders → Neural Regeneration → Brain-Computer Interface → Cognitive Enhancement Industries
loops.cure_description: Cure neurological disorders through neural regeneration and brain-computer interfaces, creating cognitive enhancement and neurotechnology industries
loops.yield_per_iteration: Exponential growth based on economy multiplier and iteration count

loops.cure_pathway: Infectious Diseases → Immunotherapy → Viral Defense Systems → Global Health Infrastructure
loops.cure_description: Eradicate infectious diseases through advanced immunotherapy and viral defense systems, building global health security infrastructure
loops.yield_per_iteration: Exponential growth based on economy multiplier and iteration count

loops.cure_pathway: Autoimmune Disorders → Immune System Reprogramming → Precision Medicine → Personalized Healthcare
loops.cure_description: Cure autoimmune disorders through immune system reprogramming and precision medicine, enabling personalized healthcare revolution
loops.yield_per_iteration: Exponential growth based on economy multiplier and iteration count

loops.cure_pathway: Metabolic Disorders → Metabolic Engineering → Nutritional Biotechnology → Wellness Economy
loops.cure_description: Cure metabolic disorders through metabolic engineering and nutritional biotechnology, creating comprehensive wellness economies
loops.yield_per_iteration: Exponential growth based on economy multiplier and iteration count

loops.cure_pathway: Genetic Disorders → Gene Editing (CRISPR) → Genetic Enhancement → Designer Biology Industries
loops.cure_description: Cure genetic disorders through advanced gene editing and genetic enhancement, spawning designer biology and genetic optimization industries
loops.yield_per_iteration: Exponential growth based on economy multiplier and iteration count

loops.cure_pathway: Psychological Disorders → Neuroplasticity Training → Mental Health Technology → Consciousness Industries
loops.cure_description: Cure psychological disorders through neuroplasticity training and mental health technology, creating consciousness expansion and mental wellness industries
loops.yield_per_iteration: Exponential growth based on economy multiplier and iteration count

infinite_loop_architecture.description: Every healing cure loop MUST execute infinite iterations

self_trace_mechanics.description: Self-trace ensures every loop returns to beginning with increased potency
self_trace_mechanics.exponential_growth: Each iteration multiplies prosperity by iteration count
self_trace_mechanics.repeatability: INFINITE - loops never terminate, always generating prosperity

global_economic_impact.total_economy_multiplier: 392000 basis points (39.2x multiplier across all 8 loops)
global_economic_impact.prosperity_loop_description: Each cure loop generates infinite derivative industries and job pathways
